column3: You're fired. Saw you on the cameras taking from the register.\nYour final paycheck is revoked. Don't bother begging.\nGood luck <color=#800000>covering your bills.</color>

Hey brother! Win <color=#2a822a>MEGA MONEY</color> with our exclusive game!\nReal players are winning <color=#2a822a>thousands daily!</color>\nOnly 3 turns per day to hit it big! Your lucky break is <color=#2a822a>one click away!</color>

Your account has been <color=#800000>TERMINATED</color> due to failure to meet payment deadlines.\nAll remaining assets have been seized to cover outstanding fees.\nYour credit score has been <color=#800000>severely impacted.</color>
